channel.title: How do I make it so you can't pk in a certain area?
channel.description:
I am making my own PK server and ATM you can PK anywhere in my bank?
How do I make it so you can't pk in a certain area?
For example, how would I make it so you can't Pk in Varrock Dummys?
And where do I put the code?

item.title: How do I make it so you can't pk in a certain area?
item.dc:creator: @Yogibear_Pk Yogibear Pk
item.description:
@Yogibear_Pk wrote:

Still need help… I’ve tried that… I’m using CheezScape Update 78

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so you can't pk in a certain area?
